bio_zh: 从事计算材料学研究，聚焦材料物理模型与合金计算方法、设计及应用开发。
bio_en: Research in computational materials science, focusing on physical modeling, alloy computation methods, design and applications.
achievements_zh: 在 Nature、Science、Nature Materials、Phys. Rev. Lett.、Sci. Bull 等期刊发表论文逾百篇，引用超万次。
achievements_en: Published 100+ papers in journals such as Nature, Science, Nature Materials, Phys. Rev. Lett., and Sci. Bull., cited over ten thousand times.
department: Materials Design and Computation Research Department
